meanings.definition: Partially secret or known only to a select few.
meanings.sent1: The group had a semisecret meeting to discuss their plans.
meanings.sent2: The semisecret code was known only to a few trusted individuals.
meanings.sent3: The semisecret hideout was not so secret after all.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held a semisecret hint of mischief.
meanings.sent5: The semisecret garden was a hidden paradise.

meanings.definition: A piece of information that is only partially concealed or shared with a limited number of people.
meanings.sent1: She whispered a semisecret to her friend during class.
meanings.sent2: The semisecret about the surprise party leaked out to the birthday girl.
meanings.sent3: The semisecret about the missing cookies caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The semisecret in the old diary revealed a long-lost family secret.
meanings.sent5: The semisecret map led to buried treasure.
